DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducting a comparison of chest x-ray (CXR) and minimum dose thoracic CT (MnDCT) in the detection of lung nodules (metastases) in patients with head and neck carcinoma.
DOC.brief_title: Computed Tomography (CT) in Head and Neck Patients
DOC.detailed_description: A comparison of chest x-ray (CXR) and minimum dose thoracic CT (MnDCT)in the detection of lung nodules (metastases) in patients with head and neck carcinoma
DOC.criteria: Patients with squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck
